name: Coffee Chaos
description:
WELCOME TO COFFEE CHAOS
Play as a stressed out young adult barista trying to serve customers on a busy day with no other employees in sight!

MANAGEMENT IS KEY 

Making coffee is a simple 4 step process but the key to mastering that process is by splitting equal attention between all of the cups you are filling! 

UNIQUE CUSTOMERS 

With different outfits and designs plus a customer happiness system you're always going to be kept on your toes!

AIM FOR A HIGH SCORE

Both normal mode and hard mode offer great chances to grind for a new personal best and see if you can stack up against others in the description!

CREATED FOR MINI JAM 100

HOW TO PLAY 

Use stick, Dpad or WASD/Arrows to move. Press A (X) to do a dash.

Go to the back of the shop and press E or Y (Square) on the machines to interact and make coffee!

 Do it in these steps. Collect cup from table, Fill with milk, Add beans, mix it. When you have your coffee walk into a customer to serve it, drop coffee's to pick up other ones with interact (when not overlapping with a machine)

Have fun serving!
